pr_title: [CDAP-16330] Added rawProperties field to PluginConfig and setting in…

timeline.message: [CDAP-16330] Added rawProperties field to PluginConfig and setting in ConfigFieldSetter

timeline.bodyText: Contains the properties as they were before macro evaluation. For example, at configure time, if the 'schema' property is a macro '${schema}', the value will be the raw string '${schema}' instead of null. This is primarily useful when one plugin is passing macro enabled properties to another plugin.
timeline.author: albertshau

timeline.bodyText: nit: move this down. It's more readable to declare variables as close to their usage as possible.
timeline.author: albertshau

timeline.bodyText:
style: method arguments should be aligned with the previous line:
method(arg1, 
       arg2
timeline.author: albertshau

replies.bodyText: In IntelliJ, this can be set in Wrapping & Braces -> Method Call Arguments
replies.author: albertshau

timeline.message: [CDAP-16330] Fixed some checkstyle issues and Javadoc comments
